msg: don't wait for ever to stop

author: alf
msg: Remove workaround for bug in httpclient 3.0, it has been fixed in httpclient 3.1
* [HTTPCLIENT-612] - FileRequestEntity now always closes the input file.
Contributed by Sebastian Bazley <sebb at apache.org>

author: alf
msg: Fix handling of HTTP PUT requests, fix for bug 43612.
Add unit tests for HTTP PUT and DELETE scenarios.
Document for HTTP Samplers how http methods works, and how arbitrary bodies can be sent for HTTP POST and PUT.

author: jacopoc
msg: Moved entity to the right package (from requirement to request); thanks to Chris Howe for the patch OFBIZ-726
